title: Prepare Developers for Integrating AI Into Their Workflows
author: Brian Wald
description: Success with AI requires a comprehensive and strategic plan. Create an environment for DevSecOps teams that embeds AI capabilities within their tools.
cntitle: 为开发者准备将 AI 整合到其工作流程中
cndescription: 人工智能的成功需要一个全面而战略性的计划。为 DevSecOps 团队创建一个环境，将 AI 功能嵌入到他们的工具中。
